reporter_caption.center: STATE EX REL. SLOAN v. HALL, 450 So.2d 658 (La. 1984)

caption.center: STATE OF LOUISIANA EX REL. JAMES SLOAN v. MR. SAM HALL, WARDEN.

opinion.concurrence_byline: [1] DIXON, C.J., concurs in the denial.
opinion.concurrence_text: [2] The trial judge was in error. One convicted of theft suffers harmful collateral consequences and post-conviction relief is available to him. However, relator only urges that witnesses against him lied â€” not grounds for post-conviction relief.
